msbt.message: Yaaay, it's !
A huh huh! Hi, !
Hey there, !
Hey, !
How's things, ?
Thanks for the gift! It made me real happy!
Thanks for the best gift in the world!
Thanks for your great gift! Are you SURE I can keep it?
What a great gift! I'll take super good care of it!
Thanks for the letter! And the gift! And for you being you!
I thought real hard, and I think you need to have this thing!
I imagined (that's when I see pictures in my brain) the perfect surprise for you! It's this thing!
I found a thing that I thought would make you smile... And then I sent it to you!
I thought real hard about what to get you in return, and I decided on this thing!
It's real funny, but I already had a gift for you! So here it is!
I hope ya like it!
Lemme know if ya like it!
I think it's real "you." Do you?
I hope ya think it's real neat!
The bugs helped me wrap it.
